answers.answer: Congrats!!! But sorry I only have one little baby in there,  lol.  Good luck with Everything!! :)
Im pregnant with twins. Im 10 weeks now, and found out at 7 weeks. Nervous and excited all in one.

I has twins with my first pregnancy the development is the same for multiple pregnancies as it is with singletons. There are some great books out there for things that differ in a multiple pregnancy  vs. singleton pregnancy. Things like higher taste of preeclampsia, premature birth, etc. I'm glad I invested in one or my twins would have came at 26 weeks in my bathroom instead of 31 weeks due to preeclampsia .  Most women have no problems, but may end up on bedrest. The book I, bought really helped prepare me  and made me recognize when something want right.How that helps! Look on Amazon for some pregnancy books specifically  geared towards multiples!
Congrats to Momys with one or twins baby's thanks for the advice... nd wish all the momys the best luck threw our pregnancy....

question: Hello mommas I'm supper excited cause we found out yesterday that we are expecting twins...  we are so happy nd nervous hopefully everything is well threw my pregnancy...  I have a question do u mommas knw of any applications that tells me how the development week by week of twins I can't find any...  help please thank u...  is there any other mommas pregnant with twins?
